info.title: Azure Network Fabric Management Service API
info.description: Self service experience for Azure Network Fabric API.

put.description: Create isolation domain resources for layer 3 connectivity between compute nodes and for communication with external services .This configuration is applied on the devices only after the creation of networks is completed and isolation domain is enabled.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Retrieves details of this L3 Isolation Domain.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.description: API to update certain properties of the L3 Isolation Domain resource.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: API to update certain properties of the L3 Isolation Domain resource.

Location.description: The URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

delete.description: Deletes layer 3 connectivity between compute nodes by managed by named L3 Isolation name.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Displays L3IsolationDomains list by resource group GET method.

200.description: Lists all L3IsolationDomains under the resource group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.description: Displays L3IsolationDomains list by subscription GET method.

200.description: Lists all L3IsolationDomains under the subscription.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Enables racks for this Isolation Domain.
post.summary: executes enable operation to the underlying resources.

Location.description: The URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Validates the configuration of the resources.

Location.description: The URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Commits the configuration of the given resources.
post.summary: Execute the commit on the resources.

Location.description: The URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.summary: Creates InternalNetwork for Layer3 Isolation Domain for communication of compute within and across racks.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

patch.summary: API to update certain properties of the InternalNetworks resources.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: InternalNetwork properties to update. Only annotations are supported.

Location.description: The URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.
Error response describing why the operation failed.

get.summary: Executes list operation to display list of all internal networks
get.description: Displays InternalNetworks list by resource group GET method.

200.description: Lists all NetworkInterfaces under the resource group.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Update Administrative state of  InternalNetworks on resources referred by their resource ids.
post.summary: Executes the operation to the underlying resources.

Location.description: The URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Update BGP state for internalNetwork. Allowed only on edge devices.
post.summary: Executes the operation to the underlying resources for updating BGP state on edge devices.

Location.description: The URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

post.description: Update Static Route BFD administrative state for internalNetwork.
post.summary: Implements the operation to the underlying resources.

Location.description: The URL to retrieve the status of the asynchronous operation.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.summary: Creates ExternalNetwork for Layer3 Isolation Domain for communication of computes with external services

parameters.description: ExternalNetwork properties to update. Only annotations are supported.

get.summary: Executes list operation to display External Networks within an isolation domain.

200.description: Lists all the  External Networks under the L3 Isolation Domain.

mtu.description: Maximum transmission unit. Default value is 1500.

importRoutePolicyId.description: ARM Resource ID of the RoutePolicy. This is used for the backward compatibility.

exportRoutePolicy.description: Export Route Policy either IPv4 or IPv6.

egressAclId.description: Egress Acl. ARM resource ID of Access Control Lists.

isMonitoringEnabled.description: To check whether monitoring of internal network is enabled or not.

importRoutePolicyId.description: ARM Resource ID of the RoutePolicy. This is used for the backward compatibility.

exportRoutePolicyId.description: ARM Resource ID of the RoutePolicy. This is used for the backward compatibility.

importRoutePolicy.description: Import Route Policy either IPv4 or IPv6.

exportRoutePolicy.description: Export Route Policy either IPv4 or IPv6.

allowAS.description: Allows for routes to be received and processed even if the router detects its own ASN in the AS-Path. 0 is disable, Possible values are 1-10, default is 2.

ipv4ListenRangePrefixes.description: List of BGP IPv4 Listen Range prefixes.

ipv6ListenRangePrefixes.description: List of BGP IPv6 Listen Ranges prefixes.

ipv4NeighborAddress.description: List with stringified IPv4 Neighbor Addresses.

ipv6NeighborAddress.description: List with stringified IPv6 Neighbor Address.

networkToNetworkInterconnectId.description: Gets the networkToNetworkInterconnectId of the resource.

mtu.description: MTU to use for option A peering.

ingressAclId.description: Ingress Acl. ARM resource ID of Access Control Lists.

egressAclId.description: Egress Acl. ARM resource ID of Access Control Lists.

importRouteTargets.description: RouteTargets to be applied. This is used for the backward compatibility.

exportRouteTargets.description: RouteTargets to be applied. This is used for the backward compatibility.

AggregateRouteConfiguration.description: List of IPv4 and IPv6 aggregate routes.

prefix.description: IPv4 Prefix of the aggregate Ipv4Route.

exportRoutePolicyId.description: ARM Resource ID of the Route Policy. This is used for the backward compatibility.

exportRoutePolicy.description: Array of ARM Resource ID of the RoutePolicies.

L3ExportRoutePolicy.description: Array of ARM Resource ID of the RoutePolicies.
